Author: kajecounterhack
Content: I see 1984 in our future. Eric Schmitt is Big Brother!!!

Author: asdflkj
Content: Probably not. Advertising is slowly becoming less like brainwashing and more like a valuable service to the consumer. Where there is value, there will be money. The only limit on that value I can think of will be reached when Google (or whoever) learns to read our minds perfectly.

Author: hhm
Content:
I think the lesson is simpler: you can't trust MD5 on data. And programs are stored as data, so you can't trust them either.

But the point is that you can't trust anything that you normally wouldn't consider to be programs either, like images and text files.

Author: gibsonf1
Title: MI5 alert on China's cyberspace spy threat
